title: 30. "Confusing Self-Conscious with Self-Confidence" On Self Awareness
description:
In this episode, we chat about the difference between self-awareness and self-consciousness, what each looks like in our lives, and how to become more self-aware.

This month's book recommendation is Everything is Figueroutable by Marie Forleo

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Click here to grab your free guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think
